name: BitcoinPriceFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Provides the latest Bitcoin & Ethereum Price.
Currently contains two feeds:
* Bitcoin Spot Price in US Dollars according to Coinbase Public API (default)
* Ether Spot Price in US Dollars according to Coinbase Public API

Updates:
2017-04-15
Added the Ether Spot Price as a separate feed.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
